Note the koala's double thumbs which are visible in the video.  The koala's nearest living relatives are the wombats.  There are only three species of wombat still alive - and all three are in trouble.  The most endangered is the northern hairy-nosed wombat - once there were just over 100 of them alive in the world, but now their number is getting closer to 130 ... so much rarer than any of the panda species.  Wombats are intelligent & can move VERY fast - when they want to.
